summary: An Ordinance of The City of Seattle granting permission to Puget Sound Traction, Light & Power Company to operate its trains and cars, and the trains and cars of Pioneer Sand and Gravel Company, and of any other company, over a spur or tract on Iowa Avenue, from Chelan Avenue to lot twelve (12), Block Four Hundred Twenty-seven (427) of the Seattle Tidelands, constructed in pursuance of a permit granted by the Board of Public Works of the City of Seattle to Drummond Lighterage Company.
